name: Duty Of the Final Slayer
description:
Slay spirits and collect stuff to survive, before being overrun.

Made for the Untitled Game Jam #16 https://itch.io/jam/untitled-game-jam-16

WASD or ZQSD or the arrow keys to move, space to attack.

Not sure if I made this too easy or too difficult, hard to say, but I did have to cut a few ideas in order submit this on time.

Hopefully I can do better with the next game.
